articles.title: Gold Price Forecast – Prices Surge Over Renewed Banking Fears - FX Empire
articles.description: It’s been a rough start to the year for precious metals and miners, but that may be changing.
articles.content: The next big surge in gold may be starting, and the $2100 level is critical. A sustained post-fed breakout would support a notable rally into the third quarter (2024 elections). Gold miners are stupi… [+197 chars]

HPE has changed its quarterly financial reporting structure with storage results disappearing into a hybrid cloud category.
